Name: 名称
Booking start time (format: HH:MM:SS, e.g., 09:00:00). Must be multiple of company timeframe.
Booking end date (format: YYYY-MM-DD, e.g., 2024-03-01). Should be later than start date.
Booking end time (format: HH:MM:SS, e.g., 10:00:00). Should be later than start time.
Difference between company and client ti: Difference between company and client time zone in seconds (e.g., -3600 for GMT+3 client with GMT+2 company)
